rComments: Professor Quaid is an adjunct for my MAT program at Bard. I earned my MFA before this program, and she has only reinforced my passion of reading and writing. I wish she were an instructor in my MFA program. If you are a writer, or a lover of good writing take her class. She will show the ways in which you are brilliant.
Andrea is amazingly sweet, very talented, and devoted to the success of her students. She is one of the most worthwhile people I have ever met.

I had Andrea for intro to creative writing and intermediate poetry and she is a wonderful teacher. She is extremely helpful and encouraging to all of her students but still provides good criticism that helps her students grow as writers. She is very kind and understanding, just don't be late! Punctuality is important to her.

UCSC's finest lecturer. She is the reason I am still in school. Not only is she professor of poetry and laureate quality, but Andrea Quaid is a mentor for all her students who seek a depth of improvement in their art. Her reader is fantastic and expansive. She is always present to workshop your pieces, meet with you in office hoursThank you Andrea!
The best teacher I had for the quarter. A sweet and sensible lady who really does want her students to succeed. Also, she's just a REALLY cool person. If you can take a class with her, absolutely do.
The woman is what you expect from a Santa Cruz poet.  Very calm, mellow and helpful.  She has a pet peeve about being late but besides that she helps even the uncreative creative writers.
